title: 637 9 "Big Names Duke It Out! The Heated Block B Battle!"Transliteration: "Gun'yū-kakkyo! Hakunetsu no Bī-Burokku!" (Japanese:群雄割拠！白熱のBブロック！) Katsumi Tokoro Hirohiko Kamisaka March 23, 2014(2014-03-23) October 15, 2023
transformers_text: 637 9 Big Names Duke It Out The Heated Block B Battle Transliteration Gun ' y ka k kyo Haku nets u no B Bur ok ku Japanese B Katsumi To koro Hiro hi ko Kami saka March 23 2014 2014 03 23 October 15 2023 With his true identity exposed Luffy tries to defend himself from Chin Jao's devastating headbutts and Cavendish's irrational hatred while trying in vain to convince them he's Lucy Luckily Chin Jao's grandsons manage to intervene and halt Chin Jao's rampage before he gets disqualified They convinced him that they should focus on the real prize and that since Luffy is in Block C they can kill him in the ring without repercussions Cavendish however intends to kill Luffy before the match and proceeds to hunt down Luffy who escaped the fight and is hiding outside hanging underneath the stands window At the Battle Royale only 30 combatants remain in the ring with the numbers being further reduced with the defeat of the captain of Dress rosa's Royal Guard Tank Lepanto by former bounty hunters Abdullah and Jeet who are in turn defeated by Bellamy However much to everyone's disgust Bartolomeo proceeds to urinate in the water in front of the audience Fish man Hack sees this as a vulgar display and attacks him from behind but somehow his attack was nullified and his arm broken and bleeding while Bartolomeo remains unscathed leaving everyone who witnessed this shocked and confused at what happened
tf_idf_text: big name duke heat block battle transliteration gun kyo haku net bur japanese katsumi koro hiro kami saka march october true identity expose luffy try defend chin jaos devastate headbutts cavendishs irrational hatred try vain convince he lucy luckily chin jaos grandson manage intervene halt chin jaos rampage get disqualify convinced focus real prize since luffy block kill ring without repercussion cavendish however intend kill luffy match proceeds hunt luffy escape fight hiding outside hang underneath stand window battle royale combatant remain ring number reduce defeat captain dress rosa royal guard tank lepanto former bounty hunter abdullah jeet turn defeat bellamy however much everyones disgust bartolomeo proceeds urinate water front audience fish man hack see vulgar display attack behind somehow attack nullified arm broken bleed bartolomeo remain unscathed leave everyone witness shock confused happen
